summary.span: Represents a large object binary () data type stored on an Oracle server.

span.span: Represents a large object binary () data type stored on an Oracle server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 来自源的所有数据`LOB`追加到当前末尾`LOB`。All data from the source `LOB` is appended to the end of the current `LOB`. 位置都不`LOB`计算也没有在此过程中更改。The position of neither `LOB` is evaluated or changed during this process. 基础数据类型必须始终相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果要将从追加，目标还必须是。For example, if you are appending from an , the destination must also be an . > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

summary.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read operations.

span.span: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打开`LOB`中模式; 因此，`LOB`可以只从其中读取，不会写入，直到相应地调用。Opens the `LOB` in mode; therefore, the `LOB` can only be read from, not written to, until the corresponding call to . 若要执行批处理写入`LOB`，调用与。To perform batch writes to the `LOB`, call with . 调用不止一次在同一事务中的当前引发 Oracle"ORA 22293: LOB 同一个事务中已经打开了"错误。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果你获取`LOB`使用另一个，且具有不会调用原始调用方生成方法，相同的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，必须调用方法完成后使用。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. 调用不止一次在同一事务中的当前引发 Oracle"ORA 22293: LOB 同一个事务中已经打开了"错误。Calling more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error. 此外，如果你获取`LOB`使用另一个，且具有不会调用原始调用方生成方法，相同的错误。In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another , and the original caller has not called the method, the same error is generated. 因此，必须调用方法完成后使用。Therefore, you must call the method when you are finished using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，你必须已启动对本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have started a local transaction.

summary.span: Gets a value indicating the minimum number of bytes to retrieve from or send to the server during a read/write operation.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the minimum number of bytes to retrieve from or send to the server during a read/write operation.

value.span: 最小要检索或发送的字节数。

span.span: The minimum number of bytes to retrieve or send.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值属性不是适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的设置。The value returned by the property is not a setting of the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 相反，它是与服务器通信时使用的 Oracle 调用接口 (OCI) 的值。Instead, it is the value that the Oracle Call Interface (OCI) uses when communicating with the server. 使用以确保客户端块区大小相同。Use to ensure that client-side chunks are the same size. 读取或写入在较小区块中不会缓存数据，并导致到服务器，无优化往返行程，因为未收到或发送完整的数据包。Reading or writing in smaller chunks does not cache data, and causes a less-optimized round trip to the server, because a full packet is not received or sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新属性对象最初具有与原始对象相同的值。The properties of the new object initially have the same values as those of the original object. 但是之后,已完成，每个对象是相互独立。However, after the is complete, each object is independent from the other. 例如，更改的值原始属性不会更改的值的副本。For example, changing the value of the property on the original does not change the value of on the copy.

This excludes any padded bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础数据类型必须始终相同。The underlying data types must always be the same. 例如，如果要复制的源，目标还必须是。For example, if you are copying from an , the destination must also be an . 目标偏移量是否超出目标末尾`LOB`、`LOB`扩展到其中复制数据。If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended. 末尾之间的空间`LOB`和超出末尾位置的目标偏移量则用零填充`BLOB`数据类型，以空格`CLOB`和`NCLOB`数据类型。The space between the end of the `LOB` and the destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types. 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能成功，但不是更新`LOB`服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`将更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` will be updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation. > > `CopyTo`方法并不会清除目标的内容`OracleLob`之前执行复制操作。The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会不会截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`长度保持不变的`BLOB`数据类型和清除的数据替换为 0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和`NCLOB`数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的总和`offset`和`amount`参数可以是大于的大小。The sum of the values in the `offset` and `amount` parameters can be greater than that of the size of the . 因此，指定的值比返回大属性成功; 但是仅清除到末尾。Therefore, specifying a value greater than that returned by the property succeeds; however only erases to the end of the . (同样，如果传递给负值`offset`，将成功，但从的开头开始，才清除。)此行为是不同的和方法和产品/服务的优势在于能够擦除所有数据值指定`offset`而不对其他往返进行服务器验证的实际大小。(Similarly, if a negative value is passed to `offset`, will succeed, but only erase starting from the beginning of the .) This behavior is different from that of the and methods, and offers the advantage of being able to erase all data from the value specified by `offset` without making an additional roundtrip to the server to verify the actual size. 不会不会截断数据。 does not truncate data. `LOB`长度保持不变的`BLOB`数据类型和清除的数据替换为 0x00。The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00. `CLOB` 和`NCLOB`数据类型替换为空格。`CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces. 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > 在此版本中，对只读的写入操作`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`服务器上。In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能是下列项之一数据类型。An may be one of the following data types. |OracleType 数据类型OracleType data type|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`Blob`|Oracle`BLOB`包含最大大小为 4 千兆字节的二进制数据的数据类型。An Oracle `BLOB` data type that contains binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 此方法映射到类型的。This maps to an of type .| |`Clob`|Oracle`CLOB`包含字符数据，基于默认字符的数据类型设置在服务器上，最大大小为 4 千兆字节。An Oracle `CLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the default character set on the server, with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 此方法映射到。This maps to .| |`NClob`|Oracle`NCLOB`基于最大大小为 4 千兆字节在服务器上的区域字符集包含字符数据的数据类型。An Oracle `NCLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the national character set on the server with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes. 此方法映射到。This maps to .|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob Null
Public Shared ReadOnly Null As OracleLob

summary.span: Represents a null object.

span.span: Represents a null object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造值为 NULL，使用此格式：You can construct an that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLOB.Null; ``` 此方法主要用于测试是否`LOB`从服务器返回为 NULL，如本示例所示：This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as this example illustrates: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` NULL`LOB`的行为类似于零字节`LOB`在于成功并始终返回零字节。A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero byte `LOB` in that succeeds and always returns zero bytes.

summary.span: Gets the current read position in the stream.

span.span: Gets the current read position in the stream.
The current position within the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流必须支持查找要获取或设置位置。The stream must support seeking to get or set the position. 使用属性以确定流是否支持查找。Use the property to determine whether the stream supports seeking. 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 查找到的奇数位置`CLOB`和`NCLOB`还支持数据类型。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的属性。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property. 属性不会不跟踪的从和 / 或已用完，跳过，流的字节数。The property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long Seek (long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin origin);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 Seek(int64 offset, valuetype System.IO.SeekOrigin origin) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Seek (offset As Long, origin As SeekOrigin) As Long
public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: A byte offset relative to origin.

span.span: A byte offset relative to origin.

param.span: If offset is negative, the new position precedes the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

span.span: If offset is negative, the new position precedes the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

param.span: If offset is zero, the new position is the position specified by origin.

span.span: If offset is zero, the new position is the position specified by origin.

param.span: If offset is positive, the new position follows the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

span.span: If offset is positive, the new position follows the position specified by origin by the number of bytes specified by offset.

param.name: origin
param.span: A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

span.span: A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: Sets the position on the current stream.

span.span: Sets the position on the current stream.

returns.span: The new position within the current stream.

span.span: The new position within the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`offset`为负，新位置必须位于之前指定的位置`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。If `offset` is negative, the new position must precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 如果`offset`为零，新位置必须是指定的位置`origin`。If `offset` is zero, the new position must be the position specified by `origin`. 如果`offset`为正，新位置必须遵循指定的位置`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。If `offset` is positive, the new position must follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`. 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 查找到的奇数位置`CLOB`和`NCLOB`还支持数据类型。Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的属性。For more information, see the Remarks section of the property.

exception.span: The parameter does not contain a valid value.

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid value.

exception.span: The resulting position is beyond the length of the value.

span.span: The resulting position is beyond the length of the value.

exception.span: The object was closed or disposed.

span.span: The object was closed or disposed.

exception.span: An Oracle error has occurred.

span.span: An Oracle error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)

param.name: value
param.span: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

span.span: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

param.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

span.span: For and data types, this must be an even number.

summary.span: Sets the length of the stream to a value less than the current length.

span.span: Sets the length of the stream to a value less than the current length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试增加的长度流失败，并返回"消息： ORA 22926： 指定剪裁长度大于当前 LOB 值的长度"从 Oracle 服务器。An attempt to increase the length of the stream fails, and returns "Message: ORA-22926: specified trim length is greater than current LOB value's length" from the Oracle server. 流必须支持写入和查找有关到函数。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to function. 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序将处理所有`CLOB`和`NCLOB`为 Unicode 数据。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode. 因此，在访问时`CLOB`和`NCLOB`数据类型，你始终处理的字节，其中每个字符是 2 个字节数。Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes. 例如，如果包含三个字符的文本字符串保存为`NCLOB`Oracle 服务器的字符集为每个字符，4 个字节，其中你执行上`SetLength`操作，则指定的字符串的长度为 6 个字节，尽管它是存储为在服务器上的 12 个字节。For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `SetLength` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server. 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > A 会写入操作的只读`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`服务器上。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关数据类型，连续类型的数组的形式返回整个基础数据`Byte[]`。For data types, returns the entire underlying data as a contiguous array of type `Byte[]`. 有关和数据类型，返回所有数据作为`String`数据类型。For and data types, returns all the data as a `String` data type. 为 null 数据一样，返回。For null data, returns . 通过比较返回的值，可以区分空数据、 null 数据和数据。By comparing the returned values, you can distinguish among empty data, null data, and data. > [!NOTE] > 使用的优点`LOB`数据类型是可检索大量数据在客户端的小区块中的功能。A benefit of using `LOB` data types is the capability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client. 但是，当使用，获取有关的所有数据`LOB`列作为一个连续的区块，这可以显著提高应用程序开销。However, when you use , you obtain all the data for the `LOB` column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteByte(unsigned int8 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteByte (value As Byte)

param.name: value
param.span: The byte to write to the stream.

span.span: The byte to write to the stream.

summary.span: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream, and advances the position within the stream by one byte.

span.span: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream, and advances the position within the stream by one byte.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果写入操作是否成功，将流中的位置向前推进 1 个字节。If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by one byte. 如果发生异常，流中的位置将保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged. 结尾之外写入`LOB`允许和放大`LOB`1 个字节。Writing beyond the end of the `LOB` is allowed and enlarges the `LOB` by one byte. 要写入到`LOB`，您必须检索`LOB`使用 FOR UPDATE 子句中的 SQL SELECT 语句，还必须具有开始的本地事务。To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started. > [!NOTE] > A 会写入操作的只读`LOB`可能会成功，但不会更新`LOB`服务器上。A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server. 在这种情况下，但是的本地副本`LOB`更新。In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated. 因此，更高版本上读取操作对象可能会返回写入操作的结果。Therefore, later read operations on the object might return the results of the write operation.
